Code Organization and Structure.task: Implement a consistent naming convention across all files and functions
Create a unified error handling and logging system
Consider using a configuration file for common settings across scripts

AI Model Integration.task: Implement a fallback mechanism if the primary AI model fails
Add support for more AI models or services
Optimize token usage and implement better chunking strategies for long content

Web Scraping and Data Fetching.task: Implement rate limiting and respect robots.txt for web scraping
Add caching mechanisms for fetched data to reduce API calls and improve performance
Enhance error handling for network requests and parsing

User Experience.task: Create a unified CLI interface for all scripts
Implement a simple GUI for easier interaction
Add progress bars or spinners for long-running operations

Data Management.task: Implement a database (e.g., SQLite) for storing and managing analyzed content
Add functionality to export/import user data and settings

Security.task: Implement proper API key management (avoid hardcoding or storing in plain text)
Add input validation and sanitization across all user inputs

Testing.task: Develop unit tests for core functions
Implement integration tests for AI model interactions
Add automated testing to your development workflow

Documentation.task: Create comprehensive README files for each main component
Generate API documentation for key functions and classes

Performance Optimization.task: Profile the code to identify and optimize bottlenecks
Implement multithreading or asyncio for concurrent operations

Feature Enhancements.task: Implement cross-referencing between different content types (e.g., related TED talks and YouTube videos)
Add sentiment analysis for comments and feedback
Implement a recommendation system based on user interaction history

Dependency Management.task: Use a tool like Poetry or Pipenv for better dependency management
Regularly update and audit dependencies for security vulnerabilities

Continuous Integration/Continuous Deploy.task: Set up a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment

Accessibility.task: Ensure all output is screen-reader friendly
Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions

Internationalization.task: Add support for multiple languages in the UI and content analysis

Data Visualization.task: Implement charts or graphs to visualize analysis results
